meanings.definition: The act of picking or plucking with the fingers, especially in playing a musical instrument.
meanings.sent1: Her fingerpickings on the guitar were gentle and melodic.
meanings.sent2: The musician's fingerpickings created a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent3: During the concert, his fingerpickings were so soothing that some audience members fell asleep.
meanings.sent4: The fingerpickings of the guitarist were like a gentle rain on a quiet night.
meanings.sent5: The sound of her fingerpickings echoed through the room, enchanting everyone.
meanings.sent6: With delicate fingerpickings, she brought the song to life.
meanings.sent7: The fingerpickings on the strings produced a lovely tune.
meanings.sent8: His fingerpickings were so precise that they mesmerized the listeners.
meanings.sent9: The musician's fingerpickings were like a dance of notes in the air.
meanings.sent10: The audience was captivated by the guitarist's fingerpickings.

meanings.definition: Small, delicate or intricate details or actions.
meanings.sent1: The fingerpickings of the artist in the painting were exquisite.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the fingerpickings in the intricate design.
meanings.sent3: The chef's fingerpickings of herbs added a burst of flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The fingerpickings of the seamstress were precise and beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The fingerpickings of the clockmaker were so tiny, yet crucial for the clock to work.
meanings.sent6: The fingerpickings of the jeweler were intricate and stunning.
meanings.sent7: His attention to detail in the fingerpickings of the model was impressive.
meanings.sent8: The fingerpickings of the artist brought the painting to life.
meanings.sent9: The delicate fingerpickings of the designer made the dress unique.
meanings.sent10: The intricate fingerpickings of the craftsman were admired by all.
